title: Ticket #6417: Prevent use of both -forward and -since flags in condor_history
description:
It's possible for a user to call condor_history with both -since and -forwards flags, ie:

condor_history -since 1000.0 -forwards

We don't support this, and is ambiguous how it should work even if we did. Instead, let's produce an error whenever a user tries to use this combination and force them to use or the other.
remarks:

Fixed. The error message only indicates "-forwards" because I think it's pretty obvious this also implies "-nobackwards".
